description:
The focus of the excellent documentary "The Last of the Great Unknown" by Dan Ransom, winning multiple awards. You can pay to watch on Amazon and Apple TV. The team made the first descent.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Packraft to Tuckup, then up Tuckup.

Red tape

Beta sites

  • Super Amazing Map  : Obsession Canyon

Trip reports and media

  • Dan Ransom : Obsession - A Rim to Rim Exploration in Grand Canyon

Background

First descent in 2011, the focus of the documentary "The Last of the Great Unknown". The team was Dan Ransom, Rich Rudow, Todd Martin, Bill Formanek, Dave Nally & Guy Smith.
name: Obsession Canyon
